## DataView.getMetadata() method

Returns metadata about the data view. Returns null if the dataview is invalid.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMetadata(): Promise<DataViewMetadata | null>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<DataViewMetadata | null>`
